description: Auto-generated from https://github.io/av-efi-schema/model for Manifestation PIDs

has_record.description: Manifestation as defined in FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual 2.0. Note that manifestation type is recorded as publication event type

category.description: Designates type, e.g. to distinguish different identifiers (GNDResource vs. VIAFResource)

described_by.description: Metadata about the PID rather than the identified object, i.e. who modified the PID metadata record when, making what changes

has_history.description: Link to revision history of this PID

has_issuer_id.description: Identifier for the responsible party as an URI suitable for linked data

last_modified.description: Timestamp (in UTC) for the latest modification to any field in the PID metadata record

described_by.title: DescriptionResource

has_alternative_title.description: Additional title(s) associated with the work / variant, manifestation, or item.

items.description: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual 1.3.2, 2.3.2, 3.1.2

has_name.description: A human-readable name for a thing

has_ordering_name.description: Provide normalised form, e.g. for sorting by title. Only use this slot if value actually if different from has_name

type.description: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual A.2
type.title: TitleTypeEnum

items.title: Title

has_colour_type.description: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual 2.3.4.4, 3.1.5.6, D.7.11
has_colour_type.title: ColourTypeEnum

has_duration.description: Total running time of the described object in ISO 8601 duration format. The examples section lists possible values for the has_value slot. See also: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual 2.3.5.3, 3.1.5.11

has_precision.description: Qualifier indicating the precision of an extent value or duration
has_precision.title: PrecisionEnum

has_duration.title: Duration

has_event.description: Associate event(s) with a moving image record

anyOf.description: Production event of a work/variant (or manifestation produced as a restoration). Provide a date or a period of time via has_date and specify located_in as appropriate, e.g. the country where the principal offices or production facilities of the production company are located. Involved parties in various roles can be linked via has_activity. See also: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual D.4.3

category.description: Designates type, e.g. to distinguish different identifiers (GNDResource vs. VIAFResource)

has_activity.description: Associate activity (and subsequently agents) with event

anyOf.description: Activity types / roles. See also: FIAF Glossary of Filmographic Terms B.13

category.description: Designates type, e.g. to distinguish different identifiers (GNDResource vs. VIAFResource)

has_agent.description: Agent involved in some activity related to the moving image resource

items.description: Agent involved in some activity related to the moving image resource. For agents of type "Person" specify name according to the convention "family name, given name"

has_name.description: For natural persons, always use the convention "family name, given name"

anyOf.description: Handle with the prefix allocated for AVefi (eventually)

category.description: Designates type, e.g. to distinguish different identifiers (GNDResource vs. VIAFResource)

id.description: A unique identifier for a thing

anyOf.title: AVefiResource

anyOf.description: Digital Object Identifier maintained by the DOI Foundation and commonly used for scientific publications including films.

anyOf.description: Copyright and related rights registration event of a manifestation or possibly of a work/variant. Always specify date via has_date. Specify located_in as appropriate, e.g. the country where the copyright was registered. Involved parties in various roles can be linked via has_activity. See also: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual D.4.4

category.description: Designates type, e.g. to distinguish different identifiers (GNDResource vs. VIAFResource)

has_activity.description: Associate activity (and subsequently agents) with event

items.description: Activity types / roles. See also: FIAF Glossary of Filmographic Terms C.2

category.description: Designates type, e.g. to distinguish different identifiers (GNDResource vs. VIAFResource)

has_agent.description: Agent involved in some activity related to the moving image resource

items.description: Agent involved in some activity related to the moving image resource. For agents of type "Person" specify name according to the convention "family name, given name"

has_name.description: For natural persons, always use the convention "family name, given name"

has_date.description: Date (or interval/period) when an event has taken place. A subset of ISO 8601 is supported, more specifically, EDTF conformance level 0 as well as qualifiers ? (uncertain date) and ~ (approximate date). See examples and references for more information

items.description: Name of country, region or other location. Names should be taken from appropriate authorities (e.g. GND) and recorded as a human readable string in the name attribute and as linked data in the same_as attribute. See also: FIAF Moving Image Cataloguing Manual 1.3.3, D.4
